settings.craftplanet.filterChat_tooltip: If this is enabled, the chat will not display any messages that contain harmful content
settings.craftplanet.maxSignTextRenderin: If this is enabled, Sign Texts in a range of above 10 blocks won't get rendered
settings.craftplanet.disableWeatherRende: If this is enabled, all weather effects like sound or particles wont get rendered
settings.craftplanet.maxParticles_toolti: The maximum amount of Particles that can be rendered at the same time
